results.content: Bought this course forever ago.  Went through it today.  It's not bad.  However, all the resource links are DEAD.  Mostly it's a waste of time since the script he talked about in the whole course is NOT available for download as promised.  I realize that it's been 5 years since the course was created, but they are still selling this course, so you'd think they would make sure it was complete.

results.content:
While in a way it looked like a YouTube tutorial, it still provided great information on how to build a file hosting or sharing site. I'm already creating mine, so thank you for the course!

UPDATE: My site is up and running! Thank you so very much!

results.content: Voice preparation, visually good, but intro voice is uncertain about the content he expects to see on the next slide. I could readthe intro myself mire quickly and effectively.
results.content_html: Voice preparation, visually good, but intro voice is uncertain about the content he expects to see on the next slide. I could readthe intro myself mire quickly and effectively.

results.content:
Thank You Zachary!  \o/

This course was easy to watch. 
The theories and concepts were clearly explained. 
There were clear instructions during the process 
This course was constructed with the student in mind. 
That's what gives it 5 stars from me. 

Also, the fact that after completing the course, I'm ready to setup what the course taught me. My confidence level is very high. And I know where to find the resources used during the course to set out on my own.
results.content_html:

This course was constructed with the student in mind.
That's what gives it 5 stars from me.

Also, the fact that after completing the course, I'm ready to setup what the course taught me. My confidence level is very high. And I know where to find the resources used during the course to set out on my own.

results.content:
I really liked this course, Zac delivers great content and very clear and concise lessons, with all you need to learn. Plus the bonus and tips he gives are worth much more than the price you'll pay for this course.

Indeed a great course for those who want to build a fileshare hosting and also to make money from it. Really appreciated the infos and training. 5 Star!!

results.content:
If you are looking for concepts, theories and explanations on the do's, don'ts or the caveats of setting up your own file server, this may not be the best course for you.

This course mostly revolves on how to use a premade software. 
But it's pretty good for those who are just starting out.
